info.title: NCDMB API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the NCDMB Document Management System. This API provides endpoints for document management, workflow automation, procurement, legal processes, and more.

post.description: Refresh the access token using a valid refresh token
Authenticate a user and create a session. If 2FA is enabled, returns a 2FA requirement response.
Logout the authenticated user and invalidate the session

message.example: You have successfully been logged out
